meta.content: The Renaissance Academy is a public charter school dedicated to excellence in the multimedia arts. Renaissance Academy’s mission is to develop caring, engaged citizens and thoughtful learners

block-animation-none clear

div.p: The Renaissance Academy is a public charter school dedicated to excellence in developing caring, engaged, citizens, and thoughtful learners. Teachers use individualized instruction to create an atmosphere that engages all learners. Students can show academic and social growth through various sources throughout the year.

figure.blockquote: If you help a child learn to read, you open the world to them.

div.class: sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12 Footer-blocks Footer-blocks--top sqs-alternate-block-style-container
sqs-block button-block sqs-block-button sqs-col-5 span-5 float float-right

div.p:
Come in for a tour of our building, or give us a call at 614-235-1900,
weekdays between 7:30 am and 2:30 pm. We can’t wait to see you!
